alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Coffee County through 430 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, Fort Rucker, Enterprise, New Brockton, Lee, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Turner Crossroads, Lowry Mill, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Goodman, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Basin, Arcus, Woodland Grove Church and Jack. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
